Chris Pomfret

Graduating from Lancaster University in 2014 with a degree in Computer Science, I’ve worked freelance as a website designer throughout uni and since. I’ve worked with sole traders and businesses with offices in multiple countries. I'm currently working as a full-stack developer using the following technologies on a daily basis:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • Javascript
  • Git
  • Postgres
  • Linux
  • Automated deployment tools (Jenkins CI / Chef Server / Capistrano)
Take a look at some of my previous work, personal projects, and blog.
